content: this crochet sweater is toasty with a relaxed fit that s comfortable for everyday wear the simple texture created with a combination of slip_stitch double_crochet and half_double_crochet stitches showcases the colorful dye effect of caron colorama haze yarn worked flat in pieces and joined together in finishing the sewn seams offer strength and structure to this oversized sweater a roomy fit and variety of sizes make it an excellent choice for gifting materials caron® colorama haze™ 8 oz/227 g 649 yds/593 m sizes xs/s m l bewitching 92007 3 3 3 balls sizes xl 2/3xl 4/5xl bewitching 92007 4 4 4 balls sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished chest xs/s 41 104 cm m 45 114 5 cm l 48 122 cm xl 52 132 cm 2/3xl 58 147 5 cm 4/5xl 64 162 6 cm
